title: Introducing: ODEO
content:
Wow.

This is absolutely stunning.

Tokyo based outfit ODEO, led by Julia and Yuma, have purposefully kept information relatively sparse. Their debut track, White Crow, is one of this years most beautiful and emotionally moving moments. Musically thereâ€™s elements of the heart-wrenching allure of Julien Baker, merged with the life affirming elegance of Sigur Ros or Nils Frahm, and when combined with the stunning video, makes for a truly hauntingly special first outing.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
